quest: Which TWO industries developed during the Great Depression?
quest_zh: 大蕭條期間哪兩個行業發展？

quest: In which year did John Logie Baird make the first TV broadcast between Glasgow and London?
quest_zh: 約翰·洛吉·貝爾德（John Logie Baird）在哪一年進行了格拉斯哥和倫敦之間的第一台電視廣播？

quest: Where are minor criminal cases in England, Wales and Northern Ireland heard?
quest_zh: 英格蘭，威爾士和北愛爾蘭的小刑事案件在哪裡？

quest: What was the system of land ownnership used by the Normans known as?
quest_zh: 諾曼人使用的土地所有權制度是什麼？

quest: In which country was Charles II residing before he was invited to England by the Parliament?
quest_zh: 查爾斯二世（Charles II）在議會邀請到英國之前居住在哪個國家？

quest: What did the Beveridge Report of 1942, by William Beveridge, provide the basis for?
quest_zh: 威廉·貝弗里奇（William Beveridge）的1942年貝弗里奇（Beveridge）報告提供了什麼基礎？

quest: During the reigns of Elizabeth I and James I, where did the English government encourage Scottish and English Protestants to settle?
quest_zh: 在伊麗莎白一世和詹姆斯一世的統治期間，英國政府在哪裡鼓勵蘇格蘭和英國新教徒定居？

quest: What is the name of the song sung by people in the UK and other countries when celebrating the New Year?
quest_zh: 慶祝新年時，英國和其他國家的人們演唱了這首歌的名字？

quest: At what age did Queen Victoria become Queen of the UK?
quest_zh: 維多利亞女王在幾歲成為英國女王？

quest: What language did the peasants speak after the Norman conquest?
quest_zh: 諾曼征服後，農民說什麼語言？

quest: What religion did Queen Elizabeth I practise?
quest_zh: 我練習了伊麗莎白女王是什麼宗教？

quest: Who was the first Archbishop of Canterbury?
quest_zh: 誰是坎特伯雷大主教？

quest: Who will remain the longest reigning monarch until 9 September 2015?
quest_zh: 直到2015年9月9日，誰將仍然是最長的君主統治？

quest: What is the name of the first major railway built in Britain?
quest_zh: 英國建造的第一條主要鐵路的名稱是什麼？

quest: Who directed the British movie the Belles of St Trinian's in 1954?
quest_zh: 誰在1954年導演了英國電影《聖特里尼亞人的鐘聲》？

answers.answer_zh: 阿爾弗雷德·希區柯克（Alfred Hitchcock）

quest: The Welsh Dragon doesn't appear on the Union Flag because Wales was already united with England in 1606
quest_zh: 威爾士龍沒有出現在聯盟旗上，因為威爾士已經在1606年與英格蘭聯合

quest: Which government was elected in 1945?
quest_zh: 1945年當選哪個政府？

quest: In which year was there a major outbreak of plague in London?
quest_zh: 倫敦的瘟疫爆發在哪一年？

quest: During the Victorian period, transport link improved, enabling goods and people to move easily around the country
quest_zh: 在維多利亞時期，運輸鏈接得到了改善，使商品和人能夠輕鬆地在全國各地移動

quest: During the WWII, the evacuation of more than 300,000 British and French soldiers from France gave rise to which phrase?
quest_zh: 在第二次世界大戰期間，從法國的30萬英國和法國士兵撤離產生了哪個短語？

quest: Which of the following statements is correct?
quest_zh: 以下哪個陳述正確？

answers.answer: Charles I's army was defeated at the Battle of Marston Moor but won the Battle of Naseby
answers.answer_zh: 查爾斯一世的軍隊在馬斯頓摩爾戰役中被擊敗，但贏得了納西比戰役

answers.answer: Parliament won the English Civil War

quest: What is Sir Isaac Newton's famous published work?
quest_zh: 艾薩克·牛頓爵士著名出版的作品是什麼？

quest: The Opposition is the second largest party in the House of Commons
quest_zh: 反對派是下議院的第二大政黨

quest: Which TWO countries took part in the Battle of Agincourt?
quest_zh: 哪兩個國家參加了阿金庫特戰役？
